title: Why am I banned?
body: I was playing a games with a few friends last night then all of a sudden I get a message saying that this account has been permanently suspended and to check my email for information. I haven't received an email and I've also never received a warning, punishment, or ban on my account. I'm not toxic, don't troll, or use cheating software. Just banned out of nowhere. I've submitted a support ticket but in the past Riot has taken 2 weeks to respond to both of my tickets. I just want to know why I am banned and has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body: Thanks... Guess I'll just sit here and wait for 2 weeks without the only game that I've played for the last 4 years.

This isn't a 2 week suspension. I mentioned in my previous message that this was due to suspicious activity, and we'll need you to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get this taken care of for you!

I understand that it isn't a 2 week suspension. I have submitted tickets in the past and it took about 2 weeks to get a response. Unless Riot has gotten better at responding to ticket submissions then I expect to basically be banned for 2 weeks until I even get a response.
I can sympathize with that for sure bro. I just wanna make sure you get this figured out as quick as possible!

It looks like your account had some signs of weird activity that most likely meant it was at risk or already compromised. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to get this handled!
Well looks like Riot has really done it this time. 2 days and I'm back in game. Wont hear any more complaints from this one for at least another 3 years!
